magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: Launches unerring darts of magical force that automatically hit their target
magic_missile.special: Number of missiles based on caster level (1-5)

light.name: Light
light.description: Creates a bright light that illuminates the surrounding area

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurls a blazing sphere that explodes in a fiery blast
fireball.special: Area effect, Dexterity save for half damage

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: Unleashes a powerful bolt of electricity that strikes in a line
lightning_bolt.special: Line effect, Dexterity save for half damage

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Creates an invisible barrier that deflects attacks

mage_armor.name: Mage Armor
mage_armor.description: Surrounds the caster with protective magical force

detect_magic.name: Detect Magic
detect_magic.description: Reveals the presence of magical auras within the area
